input.sentences: in this time of the season | most of nature 's colors are warm .
i found this lovely green flower next to my home .
there was also a very interesting flower i have never seen .
the butterflies were out tasting the buds .
i also saw this really large worm .
output.sentences: It is now warm outside all the time for the spring season.
The plants look lovely outside my home, so fresh and green.
I love to see the trees when they flower this time of year.
Their nectar must be sweet tasting for the butterflies that land on their buds.
After it rains, I have to be careful not to step on any worms.
